reviews.text: It was a wasted trip. There was a Desigual, Mango, lefties etc but the selections were old compared to the ones in town. Also prices were about the same.

This shopping center is not huge but has exactly what you need for a session of shopping. The Mango Outllet is well furnished and tidy, there's also other outlets in the mall for very good shopping. Also the food court offer interesting selecion.
